title: Safety in the home. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Demonstrates the most common safety hazards in the home and how they can be corrected. The film is centred round the story of how a child’s negligence in putting away her toys causes an accident which injures her mother. The incident leads to a thorough check of the household and the removal of other danger spots.
